concept.title: Item View vs Token View
concept.shortdesc: Item view describes how a token can be listed.

p.p:
Token View Item View
Token view is the view dedicated for each token. The token view will show the user full details of each token, including the actions associated with the token. Item view shows only the key relevant attributes associated with a particular type of token, such as balance, network, issuer, expiry etc.
The XML-declaration <item-view> can populate a wallet with the token balance and expiry time. Websites with Item View of tokens enabled can display token payment options, along with the number of available tokens. The examples below illustrates what is of possible. 1. Balance of available tokens 2. Expiry of available tokens if applicable AlphaWallet Mobile App (Available Today)
